document_data.mainbody:
Fiske was a house guard who worked for the noble Seasilver family during the late 15 century DR.
He was described as having thick lips and a double chin.
When the city of Marsember was under siege by the Shadovar, on Uktar 2 of the , Fiske was threated under pain of arrow to open the gates of the Seasilver city manse. Lady Arietta Seasilver then slipped out of her familys home to aid the beleaguered Kleef Kenric as he fought off a number of shades.
